"},"$:/plugins/xp/quickbar/readme":{"title":"$:/plugins/xp/quickbar/readme","text":"\define lingo-base() $:/language/Search/ \define statusTid() $:/config/xp/quickbar/readme/language <$tiddler tiddler=<>> <$radio value="en"> English   <$radio value="zh"> Chinese <$reveal state=<> type="match" text="en" default="en"> QuickBar is a shortcut toolbar at the bottom, on which you can place frequently used buttons. It is like the [[Menu Bar|$:/plugins/tiddlywiki/menubar]] at the bottom, or more like a Dock bar. Why build a QuickBar instead of using Menu Bar directly? The main reason is that the Menu Bar occupies the top space. I personally think it would be better to put it at the bottom. !!! User Guide * Turn on or hide QuickBar via page control button {{$:/xp/ui/Buttons/toggle-quickbar}}. Keyboard shortcut shift-alt-Q. * Quickly create a new button via {{$:/xp/quickbar/Buttons/create}}. *> If the spacing is unusual, try replacing the [[RevealWidget|https://tiddlywiki.com/static/RevealWidget.html]] in the button with [[ListWidget|https://tiddlywiki.com/static/ListWidget.html]]. * If the width calculated by QuickBar is not enough, the button will be displayed in two rows. You can adjust the [[width|$:/xp/quickbar/width]] yourself. !!! Search shortcuts |Shortcut |Function |h |ctrl-shift-F |Select the quickbar search field | |ctrl-shift-Right |Select the next Tab | |ctrl-shift-Left |Select the previous Tab | |Home |Go to left | |End |Go to right | |Escape |Clear the input field | |shift-alt-D |Select the default search scope | |alt-Enter |Open the ~AdvancedSearch panel | |Enter |Accept the selected item | > Note: The search box allow "<>" <$reveal state=<> type="match" text="zh" default="en"> QuickBar [[Menu Bar|$:/plugins/tiddlywiki/menubar]] Dock QuickBar Menu Bar Menu Bar !! * {{$:/xp/ui/Buttons/toggle-quickbar}} QuickBar shift-alt-Q * {{$:/xp/quickbar/Buttons/create}} *> [[RevealWidget|https://tiddlywiki.com/static/RevealWidget.html]] [[ListWidget|https://tiddlywiki.com/static/ListWidget.html]] * QuickBar [[width|$:/xp/quickbar/width]] !!! | | |h |ctrl-shift-F | | |ctrl-shift-Right | | |ctrl-shift-Left | | |Home | | |End | | |Escape | | |shift-alt-D | | |alt-Enter | | |Enter | | > <> "},"$:/xp/quickbar/settings/button-visibility":{"title":"$:/xp/quickbar/settings/button-visibility","text":"\define lingo-base() $:/language/TiddlerInfo/ \define config-base() $:/config/xp/quickbar/Items/Visibility/ \define promptMessage() This item has been disabled \define quickbar-button-visibility(buttonType) <$vars config-base="$:/config/xp/quickbar/$buttonType$/Visibility/" tv-config-toolbar-icons="yes" tv-config-toolbar-text="yes"> <$macrocall $name="list-tagged-draggable" tag="$:/tags/QuickBar/$buttonType$" itemTemplate="$:/xp/quickbar/ItemTemplate"/> \end Choose which buttons are displayed on the quickbar.
